metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4484 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The Debian initrd script for the cryptsetup package 2:1.7.3-2 and earlier allows physically proximate attackers to gain shell access via many log in attempts with an invalid password.

criterions.comment: cryptsetup: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
